name: The Party never stops (Drsweets69)
description:
Game Created for ZenoJam 3

You just finished your university finals and were invited to the hottest party of the year, but as the party continues you start to feel unusual

A kinetic novel written in Ren'Py 

appox. 15-20 mins in length

used the theme 'It never ends'

all images are stock photos from google
